column12: COMPOSITIONS AND METHODS FOR DELIVERING MICRORNA
column13: The invention relates to compositions, methods and kits for using Argonaute-2 (Ago-2) as a systemic carrier to deliver a miRNA to an endothelial cell. The invention also relates to compositions, methods and kits for inhibiting angiogenesis and/or treating a condition by using Ago-2 as a systemic carrier to deliver a miRNA to an endothelial cell. The condition includes but is not limited to brain vascular diseases and brain tumors.
column15: HOFMAN FLORENCE M;;FERREIRA RAQUEL M S;;GIANNOTTA STEVEN L;;CHEN THOMAS C
